memberdef.argsstring: (lbann_comm *comm, generic_input_layer *input_layer, int num_parallel_readers, std::map< execution_mode, generic_data_reader *> data_readers, bool shared_data_reader, bool for_regression=false)
memberdef.name: target_layer

detaileddescription.para: Copy function. This function dynamically allocates memory for a layer instance and instantiates a copy. The caller is responsible for deallocating the instance.

memberdef.argsstring: (lbann_comm *comm, int num_parallel_readers, std::map< execution_mode, generic_data_reader *> data_readers)
memberdef.name: initialize_io_buffer

detaileddescription.para: Get data layout of the data tensors. We assume that the data layouts of the previous activations, activations, previous error signals, and error signals are the same. Each concrete layer that is templated on its data layout should override this function to return its template parameter.
